name: acha-dinhos-landing
description: Landing page para o grupo Acha Dinhos com analytics integrado

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public'); if (!fs.existsSync('public/logo')) fs.mkdirSync('public/logo'); const files = ['index.html', 'styles.css', 'script.js', 'logo.svg', 'selo-seguro.svg']; files.forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'public/' + f)); fs.copyFileSync('logo/Camada 2.png', 'public/logo/Camada 2.png');"

author: JvMeloxx
